none: 02 Descend Into A Burning Pit Of Failure
06 Two Separate Faces Of The Same Seven Headed Dragon
08 Giant Lake Elsinore Crab Mauls Temecula Man

Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on April 16, 2024 Description from Terminal Escape:
 For readers who do not want to have a good day, GREENLING and JUNKYARD BURIAL alternate tracks, creating a north--south noise loop for the duration of the Ebb & Flow. Dizzying and disorienting tracks from the GREENLING and completely maxed out distortion worship from JUNKYARD BURIAL...there's nothing about this release that approaches calm or normal. Just maximum punishment. EBB & FLOW
https://audiblemas.bandcamp.com/music
